title: Can Worms regrow their head?
description:
Hi! It's the Trusty Narrator! Thanks for reading the show notes, SmartyPants. I hid lots of good stuff here - and you're smart enough to find it ;)

First - I'm offering $100 OFF SEA CAMP LIVE!!!! That's more than a 50% discount!! Are you ready for an amazing after-school ocean adventure with me, the Trusty Narrator? Join Sea Camp Live October 18, 19 and 20 at 4:30PM for our special pre-sale price of $97.95 - offer good until October 4! Kids have said “This is the best camp ever” and parents say “Finally something educational for my kid -that they actually enjoy!” Click here to join now!

Also, I have another podcast for you to check out from my friends at the National Children's Museum. This museum was made for kids like you! Their new season of their science, technology, and engineering podcast adventure for kids , STEAM Daydream, just launched, and answers all kinds of wild science questions. Search for STEAM Daydream in your podcast app or check out their website.

In this episode of Who Smarted?, you’re going to find out some crazy stuff about worms! Is it true that worms can regrow...their heads? What!?!?!? Want to learn more? Check out this research about how some worms have recently evolved to regenerate.

Wanna know even MORE about Worms? Of course you do, Smartypants! Subscribe to our FREE email newsletter that includes more facts, activities, and fun related to each episode of Who Smarted! Fill out the "Become a Member" form on this page now (it is totally free!) and you'll start getting the newsletter right away.

Do you want to hear your name and review on the show? Of course you do! Then take a minute now and leave us a five star review below, with your name (First name only is great!) and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode of Who Smarted? Plus, leaving reviews helps me grow the podcast , because higher ranking on the chart gets me in front of more listeners. Who knows - you could be the 5-star review that puts us in the #1 spot!! Only one way to find out!

Thanks Smartypants! Keep smarting!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
